start.text: Oh Little moths... it's time to burn.
Oh how you all flutter by, little moths...
Don't worry, little moths... this'll be all over soon.
Little moths ought to be scared now.
The fire is coming, little moths.

start_boss.text: No matter the size, they're all just moths to me.
Like a moth to the flame, the fires shall burn brighter!

retreat.text: Ah... ah ha! A stay of execution!
To leave already? These moths have yet to burn.

out_of_missiles.text: No more missiles to burn these moths...
Ah, these moths have spent all my missiles.

engaged.text: The moths come to me... as expected.
These moths shall be no challenge.

need_help.text: The moths surround me... it's time for them to BURN!
The moths come to the flame... now to ignite the inferno!

pursuing.text: It's time to burn, little moth.
There will be no running from the fires, little moth...
The fires are coming, little moth!

hull_90.text: These moths think they can harm me!?
The fire still burns, little moths!

hull_50.text: The fire shall still burn, little moths!
These moths think they can smother my flame!

hull_30.text: The flame won't die that easily, little moths!
Even these embers can still burn, little moths!
I won't let you outshine me, little moths!

overload.text: Ah ha! The ship trembles and glows!
Ah ha! So radiant we have become!

victory.text: Such it is, as the ashes after a flame.
Let their ashes be a reminder our glory.
None can stand before the brightness!
